message:
I had a problem configuring PHPMailer on my godaddy server, although it works fine on my localhost but on the server it show : SMTP connect() failed
I tried several solves and reached that I should use my goddady STMP info to connect to SMTP now I got the error : SMTP -> get_lines(): $data is "*****************.****.secureserver.net
I googled it and reached that it might be a problem with auth or ssl but I can't find a sovle :) any help !

data.message: GoDaddy do a very horrible thing, they block all SMTP connections that go to any server except their own SMTP servers, and thus force their users to pay for their mail service.
